mapper.select: (select * from books order by lendnum desc) limit 0, 10
mapper.insert: insert into `books`(bookname, booktype, image, allnum, intro, remainnum) values(#{bookname}, #{booktype}, #{image}, #{allnum}, #{intro}, #{allnum})
mapper.update: update `books` set lendnum = lendnum + 1, remainnum = remainnum - 1 where bookid = #{bookid} and remainnum > 0
